mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.client_id AS "clientId", a.ship_name AS "shipName", a.on_load AS "onLoad", a.off_load AS "offLoad", a.commencing_day AS "commencingDay", a.cancelling_day AS "cancellingDay", a.cargo_name AS "cargoName", a.cargo_weight AS "cargoWeight", a.init_charge AS "initCharge", a.contract AS "contract", a.hire AS "hire"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_project( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, client_id, ship_name, on_load, off_load, commencing_day, cancelling_day, cargo_name, cargo_weight, init_charge, contract, hire ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{clientId}, #{shipName}, #{onLoad}, #{offLoad}, #{commencingDay}, #{cancellingDay}, #{cargoName}, #{cargoWeight}, #{initCharge}, #{contract}, #{hire} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_project SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, client_id = #{clientId}, ship_name = #{shipName}, on_load = #{onLoad}, off_load = #{offLoad}, commencing_day = #{commencingDay}, cancelling_day = #{cancellingDay}, cargo_name = #{cargoName}, cargo_weight = #{cargoWeight}, init_charge = #{initCharge}, contract = #{contract}, hire = #{hire} WHERE id = #{id}
